entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
